results.text: እውነተኞቹ ምእምናን በእርግጥ በድሎት (ገነት) ውስጥ ናቸው፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: በባለ አጎበር አልጋዎች ላይ ኾነው ይመለከታሉ፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ማተሚያው ምስክ ከኾነ፤ በዚህም ተሽቀዳዳሚዎች ይሽቀዳደሙ፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
